intro: Clutter surprizes again and again with amazing new variations!
description:
The most entertaining and challenging Clutter yet with over 1800 puzzles to keep you playing for days and days.
So many new Clutter variations mixed in with old favorites for a Quest you'll never forget.
The newest variation you won't want to miss are the Petal Puzzles
And just like regular Clutter levels, they are highly  addicting too.
In addition, there are Sliders, Square Jigsaws and Box Quotes.
And wait until you see the Flowers used as Stackers.
You've never seen Clutter this challenging.
New Mah Jong Modes that let you play Mah Jong your way.
And Favorites allow you to collect the puzzles you want to play again and again.

x1 - New Object Sets and Many New Gameplay Modes
x2 - Over 1800 levels including a very challenging 100 level Main Quest
x3 - Extra easy No-Motion Old-School area
x4 - All new Petal Puzzles that you won't believe
x5 - New Mah Jong Modes that make Mah Jong even more fun
x6 - Hundreds of picture puzzles and 200 new Box Quotes puzzles
x7 - Randomly generated levels mean endless replayability
x8 - Another Great Soundtrack with a Cinematic Feel
